markdownRemark.html:
I was looking for a web blog platforms, and one thing led to another, I found Gatsby. After reading some reviews from Medium and official documentation, I wanted to give it a try.

It looks pretty cool that Gatsby uses GraphQL to pull the data directly into my blog. Well, I am not going to try to say I am going to post about this and that. Instead, I will try my best to post at least one meaningful blog per week.

I believe keeping a polished note/blog would be pretty helpful to keep track of my progress.

frontmatter.description: Reason Why I started a blog
frontmatter.title: First blog post using Gatsby
